0.1.name: wordpress/show-svn-revision
0.1.description: This plugin allows WordPress testers and administrators to display the revision and path of the Subversion working copy that their WordPress installs are running on. The information goes into a line in the admin footer. This line can be removed in favor of a tooltip if that is preferred (see installation instructions).
